NK103(pe)016:1: // tsa t+wa ri a mo bi she sha u pa d+he sha ti sma ////
NK103(pe)016:2: don bzhi lhag par gtan la dbab pa bzhugs //
NK103(pe)016:4: tsa kat+wa ri khaa mobi gashe sha u pa d+he sha can+aa ma /
NK103(pe)016:6: donkhabzhikalhag gapargtan la dbab pazhes cabya ba /
NK103(pe)016:7: dpal la gsum rdo rje lnga sems bzhi dpa' gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)016:8: bden pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bde ba che'i na po //
NK103(pe)016:9: phyogs med du 'dod pa de'i phyogs 'dzin las sgrol ba //
NK103(pe)016:10: mu matha'i phyogs ris las sgrol ba'i phyogs med kun mkhyen dpa' mo rje gnod sbyin mo //
NK103(pe)016:11: rgyal ba rig 'dzin gyi brgyud par bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK103(pe)016:12: ma brtags par ma bsgrubs par lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu khyad par can //
NK103(pe)016:13: bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung las snyan khung brgyud pa'i brda sprad pa dag /
NK103(pe)016:14: bsdus te skal bzang snod ldan dngos brgyud kyi slob bu'i don du gzhag /
NK103(pe)016:15: rang gsal ngang la phyogs med ltos //
NK103(pe)016:16: ma nor bcos med rang sor zhog /
NK103(pe)016:17: sgo gsum ma bcings bag yangs spyod //
NK103(pe)016:18: rgyan dang bcas pa'i lus la rton //
NK103(pe)016:19: ma brtags par kun shes zlas bshad na brtags shing dpyad kyang mu matha'i phyogs lhung ba //
NK103(pe)016:20: yod med gnyis ka gnyis med kyi mu bzhi'o //
NK103(pe)016:21: dang po la lta klong las lngar gsungs pa'i so so //
NK103(pe)016:23: zhe sdang mnar sems kyis kun slong byas pa'i pha ma dgra bcom gsod pa dang /
NK103(pe)016:24: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK103(pe)016:25: sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa mtshams med
NK103(pe)016:27: yang sos thig nag bsdus 'joms ngu 'bod ngu 'bod
NK103(pe)016:28: chen po tsha ba rab tu tsha ba mnar med
NK103(pe)016:29: pa ste tsha grang chu bur can /
NK103(pe)016:37: brgyad brgyad nyi tser ba'i gnas la nges pa med /
NK103(pe)016:38: gzhan rnams gling 'di'i 'og na gnas nye 'khor ba ni me mar mur dang ro myags kyi 'dam /
NK103(pe)016:39: spu gri'i lam sogs chu bo yin ces so //
NK103(pe)016:40: dgu gnyis kyi yul sems rang ka ma'i dngos por snang //
NK103(pe)016:41: chags sems kyis kun slong byas nas ser sna 'jur 'gegs dang mi dge ba bcu kyis //
NK103(pe)016:42: stongs 'gyur bsrungs pa gsum phyi nang lus dang yan lag mi 'tsham pa gnyis sgrib bkres skom snang //
NK103(pe)016:43: gshis don de kho na nyid gnas skabs bde sdug gi rgyu //
NK103(pe)016:44: dge sdig ma shes pas lus kyi gsum ngag gi
NK103(pe)016:45: bzhi yid kyi gsum ste las ngan bcu spyad pa'i
NK103(pe)016:46: mthus // gling bar che ba stong gsum chung ba
NK103(pe)016:47: gling bzhi'i khor yug gi bar gyi mun par rgya
NK103(pe)016:48: mtsho chen po rtsa ba'i gnas dran nyams mthus //
NK103(pe)016:49: dran nyams mi dang snod kyi bde ba la longs
NK103(pe)016:50: spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam yang ri dwags lpags pa
NK103(pe)016:51: dus kun tu 'jigs pa dang bcas //
NK103(pe)016:52: pa de dag las ngam grog g.yang sa gcong rong bya skyibs snang ste //
NK103(pe)016:53: gcig la gcig za zhing mi shes pa las 'byung dka' ba'o //
NK103(pe)016:54: phrag dog dang bcas dge pa'i bcu dang du blangs pa tsam gyi mthus //
NK103(pe)016:55: gling bzhi la gnas pa'i ma'i lus gdong pa glang
NK103(pe)016:56: gi tshad ni khru bzhi'am phyed dang bzhi brgyad bcu
NK103(pe)016:58: dbyibs longs spyod nor dang 'bru ras dang be'u ras nor bu dang ba glang shing sna tshogs snang //
NK103(pe)016:59: khong khro dang bcas pa'i dge ba spyad pas ri
NK103(pe)016:60: rab kyi khong seng grong khyer gser ldan khang bzangs
NK103(pe)016:61: gdam pa can na thang bzangs ris gnas sogs gnas
NK103(pe)016:63: sa steng mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi ri la lag na mtshon thog /
NK103(pe)016:64: ri rab kyi byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 'og dpag tshad stong na sgra gcan zin /
NK103(pe)016:65: de 'og nyi khri chig stong chig stong 'das pa na /
NK103(pe)016:66: lha min rgyal po dpa' bo /
NK103(pe)016:68: rab brtan gnas par gsungs so //
NK103(pe)016:69: gzugs byad ldan dang 'thab rtsod go mtshon snang //
NK103(pe)016:70: nga rgyal dang bcas dge bcu byings bskyed mthus //
NK103(pe)016:71: 'dod khams kyi lha gnas drug mdzod las /
NK103(pe)016:72: 'od dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus //
NK103(pe)016:74: gi lus dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo //
NK103(pe)016:75: tshangs gnas tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo ba'i las bsam gtan bzhi dang snyoms 'jug bzhi spyad pas //
NK103(pe)016:76: gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun dang gzugs med skye
NK103(pe)016:77: mched mu bzhi ni gnas skabs 'khor ba'i bde ba
NK103(pe)016:79: ngang tshul ji ltar gnas pa ltar rigs pas rang
NK103(pe)016:80: rang gi mthong snang tha dad la bden par bsgrubs
NK103(pe)016:81: te nyer ba spyad pas yod pa dngos po'i mur
NK103(pe)016:82: smin // te bdag 'dzin las ma grol bar bcings
NK103(pe)016:83: shing sdug bsngal gyis gzer bas 'khrul par nges par
NK103(pe)016:84: smin // shes par bya'o // de ma yin la
NK103(pe)016:85: der 'dzin pas log shes rtag dngos su smra ba
NK103(pe)016:88: 1 / dbang phyug 1rnams rtag 1111 pa gcig pu bde ba zhing rang dbang thob pa //
NK103(pe)016:89: rgyu de dag las byung ba dang byed pa po
NK103(pe)016:90: de dag gis byas pa'i 'bras bu rnams 'gyur bas
NK103(pe)016:91: mi rtog dri mas gos pa //
NK103(pe)016:92: de 0dag par bya ba'i phyir rang gi ngang tshul snga ma las bsgyur bas khyi dang bya'i /
NK103(pe)016:93: brtul zhugs ngal la 'bras bu med pas log chos spyod //
NK103(pe)016:94: de dag kyang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs
NK103(pe)016:95: pa'i lha chen po gang zag dam pa ma yin
NK103(pe)016:96: pa'i lung la rang gi bsam gtan nyams kyis sgrub
NK103(pe)016:97: ste // pa nyon mongs pa dang zag bcas pa'i
NK103(pe)016:98: mngon shes phra mos rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum dag
NK103(pe)016:99: mi dmigs pa'i rtags kyi nges par bcad kyang mi
NK103(pe)016:100: ste // 'thad de // khyed 'dod pa'i rtag pa'i
NK103(pe)016:101: dngos pos bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la
NK103(pe)016:102: ste // 'thad de // // rim rgyu nus pa
NK103(pe)016:103: thogs med yin na 'bras bu rtag tu skyed par
NK103(pe)016:104: ste // 'thad de // // 'gyur la / gzhan du rkyen gyis 'gyur na mi rtag la /
NK103(pe)016:105: mi 'gyur na phyis kyang mi skyed par thal lo //
NK103(pe)016:106: dang gcig car lan gcig la thams cad bskyed na
NK103(pe)016:107: ma 'ongs pa thams cad da ltar grub par thal
NK103(pe)016:108: / phyis kyang bskyed na gcig car byed pa nyams so //
NK103(pe)016:110: thub pas bka' dang po blo chung brid las rim gyis don la gzud pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)016:111: 'khor 'das stong pa nyid bzhi po 'khyud nas bden pa bzhir zhal gyis bzhes //
NK103(pe)016:112: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i rgyu'i gnyen po la cher basngagasa //
NK103(pe)016:113: chos gang zag 'gog tsam gzung ba'i yul 1'dzin pa'i sems 2rdul 1phran dang skad 2cig mar //
NK103(pe)016:114: gzhis gzhon gyis mi gnod bas don dam pa'i bden
NK103(pe)016:115: par grub la blos gzhig cing gnyen pos gzhom du
NK103(pe)016:116: rung ba'i rags pa dang rgyun de kun rdzob kyi
NK103(pe)016:117: bden pa yin // lam lngar zhugs pa'i tshe sa brgyad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:118: mos spyod kyi drod thob nas /
NK103(pe)016:120: bzod pa'i tshe nyan rang byang sems kyi brgyad pa'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:121: rgyun zhugs kyi 'bras bu la zhugs pa mthong ba'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:122: rgyun zhugs 'bras gnas bsrabs pa'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:123: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:124: phyir mi 'ong byas pa rtogs pa'i sa /
NK103(pe)016:125: dgra bcom pa nyan thos kyi sa'o //
NK103(pe)016:126: lhag ma zhugs pa gsum yang na slob dpon zla
NK103(pe)016:127: ba grags pas dbu ma la 'jug par zhugs 'bras
NK103(pe)016:128: brgyad la sa brgyad du bzheng par mngon no //
NK103(pe)016:129: gnyen pos spang bya mi mthun phyogs mthong sgom gyi nyon mongs pa spangs //
NK103(pe)016:130: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i dgra zhi zhing sdug bsngal gyi nad dang bral bas bade'o //
NK103(pe)016:131: ston pas sangs rgyas kyi gsungs par nges khams gsum
NK103(pe)016:132: gyi nad bral bas rang nyid zhi bder snang ba
NK103(pe)016:134: rags pa la bsgribs ma bsgribs la sogs pas gzhigs
NK103(pe)016:135: phra ba la phyogs chas gzhigs te cha med blos
NK103(pe)016:136: gzhig pa las 'das pa'i gzung ba mi gnas pas
NK103(pe)016:137: // de la 'dzin pa'i sems dang sems byung skad
NK103(pe)016:138: cig ma 'ang bden pa min drang lung nges lung
NK103(pe)016:140: nang pa rang gi rgyal ba'i lung la gzung 'dzin
NK103(pe)016:141: gnyis po kyi don don dam du gsungs rab tu
NK103(pe)016:142: byed pa nyi shu pa las /
NK103(pe)016:143: gzugs sogs skye mched yod par ni //
NK103(pe)016:144: des 'dul ba yi skye bo la //
NK103(pe)016:145: dgongs pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa ste //
NK103(pe)016:146: bardzusa te byung ba'i sems can bzhin //
NK103(pe)016:149: theg pa gong ma la 'jug pa'i lam stegs drang
NK103(pe)016:150: don tsam las nges don yin par ga la 'thad
NK103(pe)016:151: // byin rlabs slob mas gzung yul la rten 'brel sgyu ma tsam du mthong nas gnod //
NK103(pe)016:152: 'dzin pa skad cig ma don dam par mthong nas
NK103(pe)016:153: rten 'brel lugs bzlog gis ma rig pa nas 'gog
NK103(pe)016:154: /'bras bu yid sbyin bder ba mchog gi sa 'gro
NK103(pe)016:156: 'dzin pa 'thad min de yang lam stegs tsam mo //
NK103(pe)016:157: rang gzhan gyi don du sku gnyis grub par sems
NK103(pe)016:158: bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa sems tsam pa ni
NK103(pe)016:160: bdag gzung 'dzin gnyis las grol ba'i rang rig rgyu
NK103(pe)016:161: rkyen gyis bskyed pa ni gzhan dbang dag pa dang
NK103(pe)016:162: // phyin ci ma log par nges par yongs su grub pa ste rgyu 'bras tha dad kyi dngos //
NK103(pe)016:163: por 'dod lam lngas 'bras bu bka' gsar bcad las /
NK103(pe)016:164: sa man+ta pra b+ha bud+d+ha b+hu mi zhes bya ba ni /
NK103(pe)016:165: 'od zer mang po bkye bas 'dul ba'i sems can
NK103(pe)016:166: smin par mdzad cing chos kyi snang ba 'od dang
NK103(pe)016:167: 'dra bas thams cad gsal bar byas pas na kun
NK103(pe)016:169: kun tu 'od du rang nyid grol nas gdul bya gzhan 'dren pa de //
NK103(pe)016:170: nges don gyi mdo dgongs pa 'grel pa la sogs
NK103(pe)016:171: pa las chos nyid la sogs pa'i rigs pa bzhis
NK103(pe)016:172: bsgrub snang // rang rig gzhan dbang las skye ba
NK103(pe)016:173: de yang rtag pa las skye'am mi rtag pa las
NK103(pe)016:174: skye bar 'gyur zhes brtag grang na rtag pa las
NK103(pe)016:175: bsgrub snang // skye na / rim dang gcig char du brtags pas byed pa por mi 'thad la //
NK103(pe)016:176: mi rtag pa las skye na dus gsum gyi 'das
NK103(pe)016:177: pa las skye'am ma 'ongs pa las kyi 'das pa
NK103(pe)016:178: las skye na zhig nas med pas skye byed kyi
NK103(pe)016:179: rgyu min // ma 'ongs pa las skye na ma
NK103(pe)016:180: skyes pa med pa de dang 'dra ste dngos med
NK103(pe)016:181: de gnyis kyis da ltar ba la phan ma btags
NK103(pe)016:183: gal te rgyu snga ma zhig la skad cig ma
NK103(pe)016:184: gzhan gyis bar ma chod par 'bras bu da ltar
NK103(pe)016:186: de yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis bar ma chod
NK103(pe)016:187: dam phyogs gcig gis bar ma chod gnyis pa ltar
NK103(pe)016:188: na / skad cig snga ma 'gags pa'i dus na
NK103(pe)016:189: da ltar ba rang skye ba'i phyogs kyi dus dang
NK103(pe)016:190: na / // skad cig ma phyi ma skye ba'i
NK103(pe)016:191: dus su da ltar ba rang 'gag pa'i phyogs kyi
NK103(pe)016:193: ldan te phyogs gcig gis ma chod na dus cha
NK103(pe)016:194: yod pa de rgyun yin gyi dus matha'i skad cig
NK103(pe)016:195: ma'i ming gi don dang 'gal bas na //
NK103(pe)016:197: dang po ltar na sngar gyi rgyu 'gag dus kyi da ltar ba rang skye ba'i phyogs dang //
NK103(pe)016:198: 'bras bu phyis skye dus kyi da ltar ba /
NK103(pe)016:199: rang 'gag pa'i phyogs gnyis dus gcig ste bdag nyid thams cad kyi ma chod na de bzhin du //
NK103(pe)016:200: snga phyi thams cad dus matha'i skad cig gcig la
NK103(pe)016:201: thim par 'gyur bas dus rgyun 'chad de bskal ba
NK103(pe)016:202: yang skad cig tu thal par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)016:203: nges don gyi mdo zab cing rgya che ba lam
NK103(pe)016:204: skye 'gag gi rgyun las grol ba'i ye shes rtag
NK103(pe)016:205: tu skye med ces drang basngagasa //
NK103(pe)016:206: 'phags pa rigs pa can yab sras gyis dngos por lta ba la shin tu smad //
NK103(pe)016:207: lnga po kun kyang rtogs thabs mthu yis cir btags kyang //
NK103(pe)016:208: yod pa dngos po'i mu las 'da' mi srid //
NK103(pe)016:209: dngos por zhen phyir chos nyid ma dang 'dzol //
NK103(pe)016:210: snying po'i rnal ma don las 'gyangs so lam stegs tsam mo //
NK103(pe)016:211: dngos lta de las 'phags phyir chos nyid ma stong pa nyid la bltas //
NK103(pe)016:212: dngos pos 'jigs nas thal drags chad mthar ltung //
NK103(pe)016:213: rtog pa ngan pas brtags pa'i rtog ge ba mur
NK103(pe)016:214: thug chad lta ba rigs gsum las tshe snga phyi
NK103(pe)016:216: mi 'dod par tshe 'di tsam stes dbang las 'gro
NK103(pe)016:217: ba'i rigs kyang mi dang dud 'gro las gzhan mi
NK103(pe)016:218: 'dod glo bur du byung bar 'dod pa dang //
NK103(pe)016:219: la las snga phyi tsam 'dod la sems can rnams
NK103(pe)016:220: nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pas
NK103(pe)016:222: thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'thad pa min
NK103(pe)016:223: te dug gsum dang sems gnyis yod na yod mnyam
NK103(pe)016:224: chad na chad mnyam du 'dod pa dang //
NK103(pe)016:225: rgyal ba'i lung las mu bzhi 'char ba dang bral ba mnyam par gsungs la //
NK103(pe)016:226: bral ba'i phyogs kyi ngang tshul zur tsam bzung nas
NK103(pe)016:227: khas len thams cad spangs te ma yin pa'ang ma
NK103(pe)016:229: 'di dag gi 'dod pa dbral bar dka' yang dag pa'i don la gzud pa dka' bas na //
NK103(pe)016:230: nang pa la mos pa'i las can la thabs 'dzud
NK103(pe)016:231: bsre phyogs su lhung ba rnams log lta'i nyes dmigs
NK103(pe)016:233: blo spyi sar 'jog pa la rtog ges tshad ma
NK103(pe)016:234: gsum gyi sun dbyung ste thabs du mas nang par
NK103(pe)016:235: gzud pa dpa' bos gter gtad du gsungs //
NK103(pe)016:236: nang pa rang gi sde spros bral du gsungs pa'i
NK103(pe)016:237: lung la brten te ye shes 'jig tshogs bdag dang
NK103(pe)016:239: gshis kyi chos nyid spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i
NK103(pe)016:240: ngang tshul yin la der grol ba sangs rgyas su
NK103(pe)016:241: bzung ba // de ltar du bden na dang po
NK103(pe)016:242: 'khrul snang 'char ba'i rten rang snang yang med par
NK103(pe)016:243: bzung ba // zad // spros bral de 'jal ba'i
NK103(pe)016:244: rigs pa'ang bden pa mi rnyed la ye shes de
NK103(pe)016:245: bzung ba // zad // rgyun gcod pa'i // gnyen
NK103(pe)016:246: po'ang mi 'thad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes med na
NK103(pe)016:248: 'gro ba'i don nus pa'i gzhi chos sku la bkag
NK103(pe)016:249: pas theg dman nyan rang gi 'dod pa dang mtshungs
NK103(pe)016:250: par ldan // sngon lam du smon lam btab pa
NK103(pe)016:251: dang sems bskyed pa dang mos tsam gyis 'gro don
NK103(pe)016:252: de 'grub par 'dod pas nyan rang dang mi 'dra'o
NK103(pe)016:253: par ldan // zhen // deng ri dang sang la
NK103(pe)016:254: 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chad bar thal sems can
NK103(pe)016:255: thams cad bsgral bar dam bcas pa'i smon lam 'grub
NK103(pe)016:256: par ldan // zhen // pas so // des na dngos su chad par lta ba khas blangs so //
NK103(pe)016:257: 'dir zhen pa'i stong pa nyid kyi 'dam las sngar su'ang ma thon //
NK103(pe)016:258: de'ang 'thad pa min te ston mthar lhung bas lam stegs tsam du'ang de 'thad pa min no //
NK103(pe)016:259: dngos stong mthar lhung ba des na rang bzhin med
NK103(pe)016:260: pa dang snang tsam du khas blangs bas rtag chad
NK103(pe)016:261: gnyis dang bral ba'i bden pa gnyis su 'dod pa
NK103(pe)016:262: la // rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu sngags phyi
NK103(pe)016:263: pa'i lung la brten pa gnyis te dang po ni
NK103(pe)016:264: la // // tha snyad rnal 'byor gyi shes pa'i ngor //
NK103(pe)016:265: 'khrul pa'i blo la snang ba 'i yul kun rdzob tsam //
NK103(pe)016:266: kun btags dang gzhan dbang ma dag pa ni gzung
NK103(pe)016:267: 'dzin bzhi dang gzugs kyi gnyis su snang bas kun
NK103(pe)016:268: rdzob // dag pa'i 'jig rten pa ye shes yul
NK103(pe)016:269: ji snyed pa dang bcas pa'ang snang tsam kun rdzob
NK103(pe)016:270: rdzob // // snang ba la de dang mthun bar
NK103(pe)016:271: don byed nus pa ni yang dag pa'i kun rdzob
NK103(pe)016:272: ste de la spang bya'i sgrib pa dang //
NK103(pe)016:273: des spong byed kyi gnyen po lam lnga dang spangs
NK103(pe)016:274: pa'i 'bras bu ye shes bzhi dang gzugs kyi sku
NK103(pe)016:276: snang ba tsam las don med pas grub mtha' ngan
NK103(pe)016:277: pas brtags pa'i rtog bcas dang dbang shes rtog med
NK103(pe)016:278: 'khrul pa'i yul log pa'i kun rdzob bo //
NK103(pe)016:279: gzhal bya dngos po de la lung rigs pa dang
NK103(pe)016:280: ldan pa'i pas brtan por ma byas pa'i lung gi
NK103(pe)016:281: dgongs pa gzhan du drang bar nus la /
NK103(pe)016:282: lung dang bral ba'i rigs pa ni rtog ge skam
NK103(pe)016:283: pos brtags zhes mi mkhas pas kyang brnyas bar 'gyur
NK103(pe)016:284: ba des na / tshad mas ces nges par brtags //
NK103(pe)016:285: yod med yin min gcig dang du ma dang //
NK103(pe)016:286: skyes pa dang ma skyes bden brdzun cis kyang stong pa'i //
NK103(pe)016:287: dngos po'i gshis de stong 'jal rigs pa'i shes pa'i ngor //
NK103(pe)016:288: shes rab dam pa'i don du bden pas rtag chad
NK103(pe)016:289: ye shes snying po'i bden gnyis las ma skyes ngo
NK103(pe)016:291: rtag dang chad gnyis ga la zhig /
NK103(pe)016:294: rigs ba'i shes pas chos nyid kyi don spyi'i rnam pa tsam de rtogs nas kun rdzob tu //
NK103(pe)016:295: tshogs sbyor gyi lam gnyis su zhi gnas bsgom pa bskal chen grangs med gcig /
NK103(pe)016:296: sa dang por bden pa'i don rang mtshan mthong na
NK103(pe)016:297: sgrib pa rags pa las grol te sa gnyis pa
NK103(pe)016:298: nas bcur pa'i ba sgrib pa phra ba sbyang ba
NK103(pe)016:300: sgrib pa shin tu phra ba rdo rje lta bus sbyong ba la bskal chen grangs med gcig go //
NK103(pe)016:301: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe mnyam rjes gnyis la mnyam bzhag
NK103(pe)016:302: mi rtog pa'i ye shes de yang btang bas stong
NK103(pe)016:303: pa nyid // chos sku kun tu 'od kyi sar
NK103(pe)016:304: 'dod la rjes thob sngon gyi smon lam dang sems
NK103(pe)016:305: pa nyid // bskyed kyi mthus // 'gro ba'i don chen po yal bar mi 'dor bar 'dod pa //
NK103(pe)016:306: de yang don la grub mtha' nang 'gal can te //
NK103(pe)016:307: lam dang 'bras bu ye shes dang kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid gnyis rigs pas brtags na 'gal ba //
NK103(pe)016:308: des na yang dag pa'i don la rdzob pa'i nges pa'i don la sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid de dang //
NK103(pe)016:309: lam des rtogs nas 'bras bus nges pa'i don la
NK103(pe)016:310: gnas par 'dod pa gnyis 'dra bar ga la rigs
NK103(pe)016:311: // ci'i ngo bo yang ma grub pa kho na'i phyogs la nges par don dam du bltas //
NK103(pe)016:312: gang snang tshad kun rdzob kho na'i phyogs su bcad nas stong nyid can //
NK103(pe)016:313: cis kyang bden pa gnyis kyi mur lhung bas rten de la bden gnyis zung 'jug dang //
NK103(pe)016:314: gshis phyogs med don la rgyab kyis phyogs nas stong ba nyid kyi rdzong la brten //
NK103(pe)016:315: phyogs med kyi des na don las 'gyangs te lam stegs tsam las don gyi gzugs brnyan yin no //
NK103(pe)016:316: 'bras bu'i lung la brten pa ni dbu ma pa
NK103(pe)016:317: ltar kun rdzob 'khrul pa 'di ltar snang ba 'di
NK103(pe)016:318: min te // lha yi dkyil 'khor rigs 1gsum 4bzhi lngar 2gnas //
NK103(pe)016:319: rje 1dang spun 4grogs 2bzang ngan tha dad du ltas 1bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)016:320: ting 2'dzin 4gnyis mthus tshe bdun gsum bsgrubs pas //
NK103(pe)016:321: don dam par spros pa dang bral ba de nyid
NK103(pe)016:322: mngon du byas pa ni chos kyi sku yin la
NK103(pe)016:323: // kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor mtshan dang dpe byad
NK103(pe)016:324: du bstan pa mngon du byas pa ni longs spyod
NK103(pe)016:326: de'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du sna tshogs sprul
NK103(pe)016:327: te gdul bya'i ngor cir yang shar ba ni sprul
NK103(pe)016:328: sku'o // rgyal ba'i lung dang rang gi rigs pa
NK103(pe)016:329: bla ma'i gdams pas gtan la phab par 'dod pa
NK103(pe)016:330: sku'o // // de yang bden pa gnyis kyi mur thug pas bden gnyis don 'gal bas //
NK103(pe)016:331: sgom pa 'byung 'jug res 'jog gi lam can snying por gnas par daka'o //
NK103(pe)016:332: ma h+aa'i gnyis med ni don la nye'ang phyogs kyi gting nad can //
NK103(pe)016:333: ci snang ba la stong pa'i rgyas 'debs ngag tu re mos su brjod kyang //
NK103(pe)016:334: don gyis gnyis med zung 'jug lung rigs man ngag tshad ma gsum gyi mthus //
NK103(pe)016:335: rtogs pas nges par chod nas gdul bya'i blo gyong na //
NK103(pe)016:336: sbyor sgrol thabs kyis brid de don la gzud //
NK103(pe)016:337: gser 'dra'i blo la bden pa dbyer med chig chod
NK103(pe)016:338: dam yang na blo chung ba la bden pa gsum
NK103(pe)016:340: thabs lam grol lam gnyis ka la'ang bskyed rdzogs gnyis
NK103(pe)016:341: gnyis bzhis khrid nas sa gsum kun tu 'od chos
NK103(pe)016:342: pad+ma spyan longs yi ge 'khor lo'o //
NK103(pe)016:344: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga rdzogs pa'i don chen po dang ldan pa de la kho bos //
NK103(pe)016:345: nges don du bltas pa la rdzogs chen gyi lung
NK103(pe)016:346: la bsten nas dpa' mo gnod sbyin mo byang chub
NK103(pe)016:347: mos bsgral lo // de yang mi rigs pa la rigs par bshad de gnyis snang sgro btags pas //
NK103(pe)016:348: gnyis 'dzin de la ltos nas gnyis med kyang ming
NK103(pe)016:349: du btags pa tsam la blo gdeng bcas pa tsam
NK103(pe)016:350: // ma rangs khros pa'i gad mo ha ha don
NK103(pe)016:351: gyi blo skyon can gyi 'go yib gnyis med des
NK103(pe)016:353: gnyis med de las rtsal 'phags par phyung ba ni
NK103(pe)016:354: lung a nu la brten nas spyad bde ba'i thabs
NK103(pe)016:355: su // yul phas snang ba kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa //
NK103(pe)016:356: de mkhyen pa'i rig pa nyid yab kun tu bzang po'i ye shes su shar ba de gnyis //
NK103(pe)016:357: gdod ma nas 'du 'bral med par 'i sras bde ba chen por 'dod //
NK103(pe)016:358: snang ba dbyings su bsgom pa la dran rtog rigs
NK103(pe)016:359: 0pa'i ye shes su shar ba de gnyis rgyu 'bras
NK103(pe)016:360: 0kyi tshul lo // ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa'i spyod
NK103(pe)016:361: pa wa dang cang shes la sogs pa gtsor byas
NK103(pe)016:362: brtul zhugs kyi grangs nyer gsum byas pas //
NK103(pe)016:366: ngo bo gsang ba'i sku dang ye shes lnga lngar mngon rdzogs pa //
NK103(pe)016:367: kun bzang dbye ba med pa'i 'am chos nyid gdal ba'i sa'o //
NK103(pe)016:368: bde chen de yang ma h+aa bas cung zad lta
NK103(pe)016:369: ba yangs kyang don gyis zung 'jug gnyis med kyi
NK103(pe)016:370: mthar lhung ngo // yul 1sems amsnang amstong 1gi phyogs ris su ma chad pa nyid yin mod //
NK103(pe)016:371: de ltar 'gro drug rtag chad theg pa brgyad //
NK103(pe)016:372: rang rang gi rang rig tshad mas rtog dpyod 'thad bsams kyang //
NK103(pe)016:373: lnga yod pa gnyis sam gsum med pa gnyis pa
NK103(pe)016:374: bzhi dang nang pa gnyis gnyis med de mu bzhi'i
NK103(pe)016:376: dpa' mos mu bzhi kun gyi 'dod pa blangs pas
NK103(pe)016:377: lhun grub dang mu bzhi kun bral ka dag ste
NK103(pe)016:378: mtha' drug gi 'dod pa'ang bzhag go //
NK103(pe)016:379: rang gzhung 'dir ni bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung gi rjes su snyan brgyud kyis gdams pa //
NK103(pe)016:380: rig pa tshogs brgyad la gsal ba skye lugs gsum du bsdus te sku gsum du bkrol nas //
NK103(pe)016:381: don gsal byed gzugs brnyan steng du rang bkrol gyi gdams pas rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pas //
NK103(pe)016:382: shes bya'i lhag ma ma lus par skye lugs gsum sku gsum du bkrol nas //
NK103(pe)016:383: sbyor don bag chags kyi rnyog pa dwangs te //
NK103(pe)016:384: gzhi don byang chub kyi sems su //
NK103(pe)016:385: shes pa la mu bzhi dang ldan bral gnyis te
NK103(pe)016:386: mtha' drug ma spangs par rdzogs pa ni byang ba
NK103(pe)016:387: spros bral stong pa sde gsum nyid rdzogs la //
NK103(pe)016:388: chub pas rnam pa ma 'gags yod chos sde lnga rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:389: byang chub de nyid la bden gnyis cha sde bzhi rdzogs mtshan nyid rang rig na //
NK103(pe)016:390: tha dad mi gnas gnyis su med par lta ba sde gnyis rdzogs te //
NK103(pe)016:391: rdzogs cha bzhi nas kun blangs lhun gyis grub par rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:392: byang ba stong bas chub pas snang pa'i phyogs bkrol chub pa ma 'gags pa yis //
NK103(pe)016:393: byang ba'i spros bral gyi phyogs bkrol byang chub gnyis ka rang rig yin pas //
NK103(pe)016:394: bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pa bkrol gnyis pa sgro btags pas //
NK103(pe)016:395: de ltos gnyis su med pa'ang rang bzhin gyis bkrol bas //
NK103(pe)016:396: phyogs su zhen pa'i chos kun khrol gyis shes pa'i cha nas ka dag kyang rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:397: ma brtags par mtha' drug kun rtogs pa'i lta ba ni shes bya thams cad mkhyen //
NK103(pe)016:398: rgyu rkyen mi gnas rang rig thams cad gsal //
NK103(pe)016:399: 'khor rang gsal ngang la phyogs med ltos //
NK103(pe)016:400: zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gcig po 'dis bkral lo //
NK103(pe)016:401: 'das mnyam nyid ngang la phyogs ris med //
NK103(pe)016:402: rang rig pas na blta bya lta byed bral //
NK103(pe)016:403: lhun gnas bde chen rang gsal ngang du ltos //
NK103(pe)016:404: bzhi'i dang po lta ba gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:405: ma gtad la ngang du gnas pa bsgom pa'i zla yang lta bas shes bya la //
NK103(pe)016:406: mu bzhi mtha' drug gi phyogs su bcad nas bltas pas //
NK103(pe)016:407: de bsgom gtad na gnas pa tsam 'byung gi //
NK103(pe)016:408: ma gtad par gshis phyogs med kyi ngang na gnas pa mi srid pa ni //
NK103(pe)016:409: dngos po bsgom par 'dod pa la'ang mu bzhi po la stong pa dang //
NK103(pe)016:410: bden pa gnyis dang gnyis med dang bzhi ldan lhun
NK103(pe)016:411: grub dang bzhi dang bral ba ka dag dang yul
NK103(pe)016:412: lnga la yengs // stong par bsgom la'ang de bzhin du rang snang dang gnyis dang gnyis med dang //
NK103(pe)016:413: bzhi ldan dang bral ba dang lnga la yengs phyi
NK103(pe)016:414: rgyud dang dbu ma bden pa gnyis bsgom pa la
NK103(pe)016:415: yang // snang ba dang stong pa dang zung 'jug
NK103(pe)016:416: dang bzhi ldan dang bral ba dang yul lnga la
NK103(pe)016:417: yang // yengs // nang pa gnyis snang stong gnyis
NK103(pe)016:418: med bsgom pa la'ang dngos stong gnyis kyi phyogs gsum
NK103(pe)016:419: dang ldan pa dang bral ba gnyis te yul lnga
NK103(pe)016:420: yang // yengs // la yengs // don gyis ldan bral lhun grub dang ka dag /
NK103(pe)016:421: gnyis la'ang mu bzhi'i yul la yengs //
NK103(pe)016:422: 'o na khyed la'ang yengs pa'i yul mtha' drug dang ldan no zhe na //
NK103(pe)016:423: rang rig pa'i ye shes mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa'i cha nas chos drug ka rdzogs pa //
NK103(pe)016:424: des na phyogs rer 'dzin pa drug las grol ba de la 'khor 'das kun //
NK103(pe)016:425: ma lus par rang grol bas de man pa'i yengs pa'i chos mi gnas pa //
NK103(pe)016:426: de nyid mtshon byed gtan tshigs tshad mas mtha' drug rang sar bkrol nas //
NK103(pe)016:427: rang rang gi brtags pas grub mtha' drug tu shar
NK103(pe)016:428: ba rang sar dag ste yin lugs kyi don lta
NK103(pe)016:430: bden thog nyid du gnas pas tshogs brgyad skye lugs gsum gyi ngang ma bcos pas rang dang //
NK103(pe)016:431: sku gsum lhun grub gsum la gnas pas ma btsal
NK103(pe)016:432: bar lhug pa ste gzhag thabs gsum gyi ngang goms
NK103(pe)016:433: pa tsam mo // rig pa mi gsal te bying
NK103(pe)016:434: ba ji ltar gseng na snang g.yel che sar bsdad
NK103(pe)016:436: snga dro dang srod la bad kan gyi dus su
NK103(pe)016:437: bcag cing nyi ma phyed na mkhris pa'i dus na
NK103(pe)016:438: chus bkru // dgong ka rlung gi dus su bsku
NK103(pe)016:439: mnye bya yid du 'ong ba'i zlas skyo ba gsang
NK103(pe)016:441: mos pa dang de'i yon tan gyis brod pa bskyed cing ngo mtshar yul //
NK103(pe)016:442: dran pas shes pa rgya bskyed sgrol ma steng rlung gnan 'og rlung 'then pas bying ba gseng //
NK103(pe)016:443: rmugs te shes bya'i don mi gsal na snyan khung gdams pa'i gnad kyis rtogs pa don du gnyer //
NK103(pe)016:444: rig pa yul la 'phro zhing rgod na gang 'phro'i
NK103(pe)016:445: yul dang sems la brtags pas rtog pa kha brlan
NK103(pe)016:446: // rtog pa thams cad don las ma 'das pas tshul ngan pa'i rtsol ba las grol //
NK103(pe)016:447: bya ba'i las kyis khrid de g.yeng na ngan shugs
NK103(pe)016:448: de 'khor ba'i nyes pa dran pas rig pa srang
NK103(pe)016:449: du gzud // dad brtson brtse gdung gsum bral na nams kyang gdams pa la kha lan zlos //
NK103(pe)016:450: dam nyams chen po de na rag rdo rje ste
NK103(pe)016:451: 'khor ba'i 'gram du ltung ba'i skyon yod pa de
NK103(pe)016:452: bas gdams pa ma thos pa nyes pa chung ba
NK103(pe)016:453: des na dam pa'i gsung bzhin du 'bad pa //
NK103(pe)016:454: des na gnas las mi g.yo mnyam nyid lhun gyis gnas pa'i nyams rim bzhi po re re la //
NK103(pe)016:455: ngo bo dpe rtags 'bras bu dang bzhi bzhi blan cing sbyang //
NK103(pe)016:456: mthangs rmi lam la tshad gzung ba ni bag chags 'ol ka de //
NK103(pe)016:457: sngar las gyong po'i rjes 'brang chad pa dang //
NK103(pe)016:458: gang la gces par 'dzin pa de 'char rig pa spyi blugs yin pas //
NK103(pe)016:459: de yang lta sgom gyi gdeng gis 'char rmi ltas ya mtshan can //
NK103(pe)016:460: 'ga' byung ba ni brnag ste de yang rmi lam gyi dus de kar sbyang //
NK103(pe)016:461: rmi ltas de 'am rnams phyi rtags lus la mang du 'char te gtsor mi gzung //
NK103(pe)016:462: rnam shes brgyad gsum yul bcas brdzun pas der zhen grol //
NK103(pe)016:463: de don ye shes kyi ngang du grol te don la mkhas pas //
NK103(pe)016:464: sngar thos pa min pa'i chos la the tshom gcod par nus //
NK103(pe)016:465: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la thugs brtse zhing phan sems can //
NK103(pe)016:466: sangs rgyas mthar thug yang dgos yin zhes de las brtags //
NK103(pe)016:467: brgyad gsum yul bcas don rtogs dmigs pa gtad nas rtog pa bzlog pa dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)016:468: de yi rkang pa gnyis kyis ma nor bcos med kyi don bkrol ba'o //
NK103(pe)016:469: ngang gnas de don ma nor bas //
NK103(pe)016:470: de la bcos med yin don rtogs pa'i rang sor zhog /
NK103(pe)016:471: gnyis pa bsgom pa gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:472: ma btsal don grub pa spyod pa'i zla yang mnyam
NK103(pe)016:473: grol gyi don la mtha' drug gi phyogs su bcad
NK103(pe)016:474: pas // rang rang dang mthun par phyogs su 'then pa'i don grub pa tsam srid pa yin gyi //
NK103(pe)016:475: ma btsal bden pa'i don la lhun gyis gnas par dka' ste //
NK103(pe)016:476: dkar spyod gnag spyod gnyis dang bya bral gyi phyogs su bcad pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)016:477: rnal ma'i don 'dir gnas na thams cad byang chub kyi sems yin pas //
NK103(pe)016:478: de yi ngang du gnas pa'i sgo gsum gyi bya ba yang //
NK103(pe)016:479: bya bral ngang gnas phyogs med nam mkha' la //
NK103(pe)016:480: snying po'i ngang la 'gyur med rdo rjer gnas //
NK103(pe)016:481: nam mkha' rdo rje des 'dul ba'i mos pa dang mthun pas 'dren spyod rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:482: snyom las su 'dug pa las rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po lhag pas lhag spyod rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:483: rnam pa ma 'gags pas gdul bya kun sgrol bas gzhan gyi don chen po lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)016:484: gdul bya phal cher 'khrul pa 'khor ba'i nyes pas skyo nas don la 'jug /
NK103(pe)016:485: nyes pa de la dngos su sgrol ba ni dkar spyod dge ba rdzogs //
NK103(pe)016:486: de la gdul bya mos pa 'jug pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa spyi dang mthun //
NK103(pe)016:487: dkar spyod de yi spyod yul rang 'od thugs rje rnam pa sgyu ma //
NK103(pe)016:488: spyod sems mtshan nyid rang rig de'i rang bzhin spros pa rnam par dag /
NK103(pe)016:489: phyogs med kun khyab snying po rnal ma'i don las mi 'gyur bas //
NK103(pe)016:490: mu bzhir 'then nas spyod pa la don khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:491: gal te log pa'i sred chen chags sdang dbral dka' bas //
NK103(pe)016:492: grol bar mos kyang der zhen ma thongs na //
NK103(pe)016:493: mtshams med la sogs pa nag po'i spyod pa'ang rnal ma'i don la sbyar te drang ba ni //
NK103(pe)016:494: nag spyod kyi ming tsam las don la sdeb po
NK103(pe)016:495: bzhi'i bsgyur te ldem por dgongs pa'am yang na snying
NK103(pe)016:497: gnag dang spyod yul rang 'od rnam pa sgyu ma la //
NK103(pe)016:498: spyod sems mthar thug brtags na rang rig nyid //
NK103(pe)016:499: de dag rang bzhin zhen drug log gsum rtsol brgyad brtags pas spros pa las grol //
NK103(pe)016:500: de gsum ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pas phyogs med las mi 'gyur //
NK103(pe)016:501: dman pa'i gnas su sbyor ba'i nag spyod rang rgyud
NK103(pe)016:502: pa las don rtogs pa dang ngang du gnas pas
NK103(pe)016:503: 'phags // mtha' drug gi phyogs su 'then pa'i rtsol
NK103(pe)016:504: ba las grol te don kun ngang gis grub pa'o
NK103(pe)016:505: 'phags // // don gnas sgo gsum ma bcings kyi don no //
NK103(pe)016:506: lus ngag yid spyod bcing mi dgos //
NK103(pe)016:507: gsum pa spyod pa gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:508: ma bsgrubs par lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu'i zla ni phyogs med kyi ngang tshul ma rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)016:509: mu bzhi phyogs su 'then nas bltas pa ltar snang btags so cog chags bsgrubs pa ltar 'grub ste //
NK103(pe)016:510: bden par ma bsdad pas dngos po sgrub pa la stong pas brgyangs //
NK103(pe)016:511: stong pa bsgrubs pa la snang ba'i sel zhugs bden gnyis su sgrub pa'ang //
NK103(pe)016:512: rnal ma'i don la gnyis grol zung du 'jug pas bkan //
NK103(pe)016:513: gnyis su med par bsgrubs pa la'ang ltos gzhi gnyis sgro btags yin pas bslad //
NK103(pe)016:514: gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu tsam du snang gi ma
NK103(pe)016:515: btsal bar bden pa'i don la gnas pa ci la
NK103(pe)016:516: srid // dmus long mang po glang chen ma mthong
NK103(pe)016:517: ba sha stag gis lus kyi bye brag so so
NK103(pe)016:518: la reg ste 'thub pa ni kha cig na re
NK103(pe)016:519: ri rab rtsib logs kyi bye brag bzung bas ril
NK103(pe)016:521: kha cig na re sna la reg pa gshol mda'
NK103(pe)016:522: lta bu zhig go zer de bzhin du mche ba
NK103(pe)016:523: gtun shing dang rna ba zhib ma dang rkang lag
NK103(pe)016:524: ka ba dang rnga ma phyags ma dang sgal tshigs
NK103(pe)016:525: kha cig na re pha bong lta bu zhig go
NK103(pe)016:526: zer rang 'dod kyi 'bras bu grub kyang mthar thug
NK103(pe)016:528: bus pa nyon thos pas dgra bcom rang rgyal yid sbyin bde mchog gi 'bras bur gnas pa ltar //
NK103(pe)016:529: mi rigs pa la rigs par bshad mi 'tsham pa la 'tsham zhing 'thad par 'dod pa de //
NK103(pe)016:530: nges pa don gyi mdo sde dang rgyud sde'i don brtags pa'i snyan khung brgyud pas blan //
NK103(pe)016:531: bden pa'i ngang tshul ni dngos stong gnyis dang gnyis med mu bzhi dang //
NK103(pe)016:532: kun bsgrub kun bral te mtha' drug kho nar bden min gnas //
NK103(pe)016:533: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs su lta bas chod pa'i ngang tshul nyid du grol la //
NK103(pe)016:534: bya btsal ci dgos gshis bden thog tu zungs thub pas //
NK103(pe)016:535: kun brtags rang sar grol nas bden thog tu gnas par thag chod pa tsam //
NK103(pe)016:536: de'i yon tan gyi ldog cha las sku gsum mam
NK103(pe)016:537: lnga phan tshun gyi zhen pa bkrol nas mu bzhi
NK103(pe)016:538: las 'das // ye shes lnga tshogs brgyad dang drug
NK103(pe)016:539: dgu las 'das pa'i thig 'bras klong bzhin le drug
NK103(pe)016:540: las 'das // / che ba bzhis 'og ma las dpags te che ba lnga pas a ti'i ngang //
NK103(pe)016:541: rang rig la stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa srid pas 'khor ba'i mtha' las bsgral bas mdzes //
NK103(pe)016:542: rnam pa ma 'gags pas 'gro don grub pa ni
NK103(pe)016:543: zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' bsgral mdzes
NK103(pe)016:544: // de yang rang rig pa'i ngang du rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)016:545: phyi rol don gyi dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin
NK103(pe)016:547: de gsum ma 'dres pas gcig pur 'dzin pa'i mtha' bsgral mdzes //
NK103(pe)016:548: yongs su rdzogs pas tha dad du 'dzin pa'i mtha' dang bral nas mdzes pa //
NK103(pe)016:549: de'i ngang la yon tan bsam yas pa kun rten
NK103(pe)016:550: pas lus su grub pa med pa nyid lus kyi
NK103(pe)016:551: mchog de // ye shes rgyan rgyan dang bcas pa'i
NK103(pe)016:552: zhes pa'i tshig rkang gsum gyis bkrol gyis brgyan pa'i
NK103(pe)016:553: mchog de // 'khor lo'i ngang // tshig rjes ma gcod lhun gnas don la rton //
NK103(pe)016:554: bzhi pa 'bras bu gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:556: rang rang gis rnam brtags kyi 'dod pa nyer ba
NK103(pe)016:557: bsgrubs nas lus can thams cad ming la ngos par
NK103(pe)016:558: 'dzin he sgra rten yid la byed pas na //
NK103(pe)016:559: kho bos kyang snang stong gnyis su 'dod pa 'khrul
NK103(pe)016:560: pas brtags par snang nas gnyis med nges don snying
NK103(pe)016:562: mtha' drug kun mkhyen kyang gang gi yang phyogs su
NK103(pe)016:563: ma lhungs pa'i dgongs pas bstan te zhen pa bkrol
NK103(pe)016:564: nas yin don shar ba ni rang gnas sbas pa
NK103(pe)016:565: dang 'dra ba de bstan nas dam pas bsgral //
NK103(pe)016:566: sh+r+ai seng+hasa rdzogs chen spyi gzhung la brten nas dge
NK103(pe)016:567: slong dpa' bo yin mod la des don du lta
NK103(pe)016:568: ba dang snang cha 'khrul snang du 'dod pa'i shugs
NK103(pe)016:570: don gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dod pa dang
NK103(pe)016:571: mtshungs par 'dod pa de las blo bkrol bas don
NK103(pe)016:572: 'di la nan tan mdzod cig ces gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)016:573: nges don bzhi mngon du bstan pa'i gnas kyis zlas
NK103(pe)016:574: bshad 'dra tshul gyi lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhi las
NK103(pe)016:575: khyad phye ba'i don bzhi pa //
NK103(pe)016:576: 'di yis ma 'ongs skal ldan snod can don la 'dzud pa'i cha rkyen mdzod //
NK103(pe)016:577: gzhi'i nyes pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal lam gyi nyes
NK103(pe)016:578: pa rtsol ba'i nad las dgrol ba'i gnad du rtogs
NK103(pe)016:579: goms spyod grol bzhi las ma gtogs pa'i thabs med
NK103(pe)016:580: // gnad kyi lhag par gtan la phab pa don bzhi pa //
NK103(pe)016:581: slob dpon ku ku r+aa dzas mdzad pa /
